com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd
Class WidgetDnDElement

java.lang.Object
  com.objetdirect.tatami.client.dnd.WidgetDnDElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDnDElement
public class WidgetDnDElement
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDnDElement

This class implements a IDnDElement for a widget. It is used to wrap a widget as a draggable element

Author:
rdunklau
